The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 05 January is 306,863 (Inf cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 December, there were 740 new confirmed cases (Inf new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 December, there were 1,045 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 29% (305 fewer cases).
